snippet: George T. McDonald says the fund-raising rule that excludes him from the televised event should also apply to another candidate: John A. Catsimatidis, the billionaire owner of Gristedes.
abstract: Trailside blog; George T McDonald says fund-raising rule that excludes him from final televised Republican New York City mayoral debate should also apply to another candidate, John A. Catsimatidis, billionaire owner of Gristedes.
lead_paragraph: George T. McDonald says the fund-raising rule that excludes him from the televised event should also apply to another candidate: John A. Catsimatidis, the billionaire owner of Gristedes.

headline.main: Barred From Debate, McDonald Asks Why Catsimatidis Isn’t
headline.print_headline:
Kept From Debate,
And Pointing Finger
